## TargetType type

Represents the data of a Target Type used as a target for publishing.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type TargetType = PublishingTarget & {
    AccessControlList?: AccessControlList;
    BusinessProcessType?: Link;
    ContentSecurityDescriptor?: SecurityDescriptor;
    MinimalApprovalStatus?: Link;
    Priority?: PublishPriority;
    Purpose?: string;
};
```
